name: Brain Puzzle: IQ Challenge
description:
What's your IQ? Are you ready to find out?

Play now and see if you're smarter than your friends!

Brain Puzzle: IQ Challenge is an addictive brain game with all sorts of fun questions that will prove how smart you are! All types of questions for working out all the parts of that big brain of yours! Think outside of the box and play now!

Features:
- Imaginative game play!
- Fun puzzles!
- Brain teasers!
- Ducks!
- More brain teasers!
- Increase your brain power now!
- Think creatively outside and inside the box! Let your imagination run wild now!

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at:

hello@gamejam.co
